```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r}
clues <- read_tsv("./data/master_season1-35.tsv")
```

```{r}
clean <- clues %>% 
  select(category, answer, question)
answers <- clean %>% 
  select(answer)
years_data <- answers %>% 
  mutate(years = str_extract(answer, "[0-9]{4}")) %>% 
  mutate(amended = str_extract(answer, "'[0-9]{2}")) %>% 
  select(answer, years, amended) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(years)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(amended))
  
years_data
```
